page.title: List of awards and nominations received by Stargate SG-1

{{portal|Stargate|Stargate-color.png}}
 
''Stargate SG-1'' is an [[United States|American]]-[[Canadian]] [[military science fiction]] [[television series]] and part of [[MGM]]'s [[Stargate|Stargate franchise]]. The show was created by [[Brad Wright]] and [[Jonathan Glassner]], based on the 1994 feature film ''[[Stargate (film)|Stargate]]'' by [[Dean Devlin]] and [[Roland Emmerich]]. The first five seasons of the television series were broadcast by [[Showtime]] before the series moved to the [[Sci Fi Channel (United States)|Sci Fi Channel]] for its last five seasons. ''Stargate SG-1'' premiered on Showtime on July 27, 1997; its final episode premiered on [[Sky1]] in the United Kingdom on March 13, 2007. ''Stargate SG-1'' was nominated for and won numerous awards in its ten-season run.
''Stargate SG-1'' is an [[United States|American]]-[[Canadian]] [[military science fiction]] [[television series]] and part of [[MGM]]'s [[Stargate|Stargate franchise]]. The show was created by [[Brad Wright]] and [[Jonathan Glassner]], based on the 1994 feature film ''[[Stargate (film)|Stargate]]'' by [[Dean Devlin]] and [[Roland Emmerich]]. The first five seasons of the television series were broadcast by [[Showtime]] before the series moved to the [[Sci Fi Channel (United States)|Sci Fi Channel]] for its last five seasons. ''Stargate SG-1'' premiered on Showtime on July 27, 1997; its final episode premiered on [[Sky1]] in the United Kingdom on March 13, 2007. ''Stargate SG-1'' was nominated for and won numerous awards in its ten-season run.
